parameter.title: Calibration
parameter.abstract: Define the type of calibration: gamma or sigma

parameter.title: Spatial resolution
parameter.abstract: Pixel Size (in meters) of the output images

parameter.title: Orthorectification grid spacing
parameter.abstract: Grid spacing for the interpolator in the orthorectification process

parameter.title: Border threshold
parameter.abstract: Threshold on the image level to be considered as zeros

parameter.title: Tile to product overlap ratio
parameter.abstract: Percentage of tile area to be covered for a tile to be retained

parameter.title: Filtering
parameter.abstract: If True, the multiImage filtering is activated after the tiling process

parameter.title: Window radius
parameter.abstract: Set the window radius for the spatial filtering
